thread.title: Shim Eun Kyung And Ha Yeon Soo Show Their Love For Close Friend, Red Velvet’s Yeri
thread.title_full: Shim Eun Kyung And Ha Yeon Soo Show Their Love For Close Friend, Red Velvet’s Yeri

author: jeeelim5
title: Shim Eun Kyung And Ha Yeon Soo Show Their Love For Close Friend, Red Velvet’s Yeri
text:
Shares 320   
Shim Eun Kyung and Ha Yeon Soo recently showed their support for their friend, Red Velvet’s Yeri. 
The two actresses held their “Time to Meet Eun Kyung and Yeon Soo” broadcast on Naver’s V App on February 28. Red Velvet’s Yeri even left comments while the broadcast was airing live, giving fans a chance to see the three friends interact. 
When asked what song they’re enjoying these days, the two actresses took the opportunity to do some promotion for Yeri’s girl group, Red Velvet. Ha Yeon Soo chose Red Velvet’s “Rookie” while Shim Eun Kyung said, “Red Velvet’s ‘Talk To Me’ is a great song. I’m really enjoying it.” 
On how they became friends, Ha Yeon Soo replied, “We understand each other on so many different levels, so we just became friends.” 
Source (1)
